title: Barca Land Lewandowski
description:
The FC crew react to Robert Lewandowski's looming transfer to Barcelona and question why Barcelona continue to make attacking signings they don't necessarily need. Plus, the guys discuss the possibility of Eden Hazard backing up Benzema for Real Madrid and Christian Pulisic sits down with Herculez Gomez for an exclusive interview.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Robert Lewandowski finally closes in on Barcelona; Hazard False 9 at Real Madrid?; Exclusive Christian Pulisic
